general.title: General Practice Care
general.description: Comprehensive medical care for the whole family with personal attention and support.

ecg.title: Resting ECG
ecg.description: Recording of electrical heart activity to detect cardiac arrhythmias and other heart conditions.

holter.title: Holter Monitor
holter.description: 24-hour ECG recording including atrial fibrillation analysis and sleep apnea pre-analysis for comprehensive cardiac diagnostics.

bloodPressure.title: 24-Hour Blood Pressure
bloodPressure.description: 24-hour blood pressure monitoring including PWA measurement for accurate assessment of your blood pressure behavior.

spirometry.title: Spirometry
spirometry.description: Lung function testing for diagnosis and monitoring of respiratory conditions such as asthma or COPD.

ultrasound.title: Ultrasound
ultrasound.description: Sonography of abdominal organs, chest organs, thyroid, carotid arteries, abdominal aorta, and vessels (thrombosis, PAD).

lab.title: Laboratory Diagnostics
lab.description: Comprehensive blood and urine tests for precise diagnosis.

preOp.title: Preoperative Diagnostics
preOp.description: Comprehensive examination and preparation before planned surgeries.

checkup.title: Health Check-up
checkup.description: Regular preventive examinations for early detection of diseases.

cancer.title: Cancer Screening
cancer.description: Consultation and examination for early detection of cancer.

dmp.title: DMP Programs
dmp.description: Disease management programs for chronically ill patients (diabetes, CHD, asthma, COPD).

igel.title: Private Services
igel.description: Individual health services and private additional services.

vaccination.title: Vaccination Advice
vaccination.description: Individual vaccination advice and administration of all recommended vaccinations.

chronic.title: Chronic Care
chronic.description: Long-term support and treatment of chronically ill patients.

travel.title: Travel Medicine
travel.description: Travel medicine consultation and vaccinations for your trips abroad.

motto.title: Our Motto
motto.text: General practice care with internal medicine expertise.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.text: Our goal is to offer you internal medicine diagnostics and therapy at specialist level in addition to general practice care. It is important to us to provide you with individual care, both personally and medically. We are at your service with high professional competence through many years of experience in hospitals and private practice.

history.title: Our History
history.text: Since April 2023, Jwan Amara, specialist in internal medicine, has been running the internal medicine practice in the practice rooms at Eidelstedter Platz 6a. With a dedicated team, we offer our patients comprehensive medical care.

practice.title: Our Practice
practice.text: Our modern practice rooms are centrally located at Eidelstedter Platz and are easily accessible by public transport. We have modern diagnostic equipment for comprehensive internal medicine examinations.

trust.title: Trust
trust.text: A trusting doctor-patient relationship is the foundation of our work.

competence.title: Competence
competence.text: Professional expertise through continuous training and many years of experience.

care.title: Care
care.text: Personal attention and individual treatment for every patient.

modern.title: Modernity
